Articles.Content:
had been flying around Duna for a while when I noticed this

![24pcghc.jpg](http://i60.tinypic.com/24pcghc.jpg)

Some how I managed to orbit Duna, without actually orbiting Duna. I would like to fix this if I can because I invested a lot of my money in this mission. I can recover, but it will require grinding instead of pushing forward.

Any help would be appreciated. 

(Note, I took out the contract 3 in game years before I went to Duna, so it shouldn't be a timing issue.)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-13T00:14:39Z" title="03/13/2015 12:14  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 13, 2015</time> by Jakinbandw**
  
Changed tag

Just a couple of questions:

What does the information button in map mode says in status?

What altitude is your periapsis at? It might be below the atmosphere limit (41k according to wiki) so you might be still classified as sub-orbital.

![20ac909.jpg](http://oi57.tinypic.com/20ac909.jpg)

So the game does think it is sub orbital. Any idea how to fix that?

[Edit] So I messed around with my orbit and I found that if your periapsis is below 50,000 you are considered sub orbital even though there is no atmosphere to slow you down. Odd.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-13T00:13:54Z" title="03/13/2015 12:13  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 13, 2015</time> by Jakinbandw**

Good to know you could fix your problem. 

This looks like a bug, you might want to report it with the pictures you took.
